DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate drug behavior safety single dose 22 milligram tofacitinib ( CP-690,550 ) modified-release formulation 18 healthy volunteer take eat high fat meal ( effect food ) . This compare drug behavior safety single dose 22 milligram tofacitinib ( CP-690,550 ) modified-release formulation take 10 hour fast .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Effect Of Food On The Behavior Tofacitinib Modified Release 22 Milligram Tablets In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer and/or healthy female volunteer nonchildbearing potential 18 55 year age ; Healthy volunteer evidence active latent inadequately treated tuberculosis . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ; Clinically significant infection within past 3 month
